thread.title: Edge on Demand: Urban Outfitters, Grinding and Donald Trump
thread.title_full: Edge on Demand: Urban Outfitters, Grinding and Donald Trump

title: Edge on Demand: Urban Outfitters, Grinding and Donald Trump
text:
Story Created: Oct 8, 2015 at 11:36   8, 2015 at 11:36 PM EDT 
Urban Outfitters is not in the giving mood this holiday season. According to Gawker, the Philadelphia-based retailer sent out an email asking salaried employees to work without pay during five weekend days in October. 
The email requests volunteers to "pick, pack and ship orders" ahead of the holiday rush. The kicker? The company is selling the idea as a "team building activity." 
So our Question of the Night: Would you work for your company for free?
